name: Blizzard Scout 1 (V)
Lore: 'Enclosed All Terrain Scout Transport (AT-ST). Provides flanking support to the AT-ATs of Blizzard Force. Modified for cold weather combat.',
Text: 'May add 1 pilot or passenger. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. May move as a ''react.'' During battle, if with your piloted AT-AT, may cancel game text of an opponent''s character present.',
